text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The Chinese Communist Party engineered the COVID-19 virus at their biowarfare lab (Wuhan Institute of Virology). They were grossly negligent in the way that they handled the deadly virus. They threw infected PPE into the garbage. Scavengers took it & used it in the wet markets.
